summary:
Trade smarter - HOTX rebrands: Innovating the design, keeping the commitment

 1000 USDT welcome gift package for new HOTX users - Sign up with phone or email

 $38 billion - 24h trading volume exchange

 350+ - cryptocurrencies listed

 120 million - registered users

 <0.10% - lowest transaction fees
proposal:
Hello HOTX community! 👋

I see you're all about trading smarter, not harder, and we love that! We're like the DIY store of the blockchain world, providing tools to empower communities like yours. 

Impressed by your trading volume of $38 billion in 24 hours 😮, and the whopping 120 million registered users, we thought you might be interested in some of our B2B tools to further enhance your community experience. 

1. 🔄 DEX (UNI FACTORY) - Create your own DEX, with customizable features and 0.00% to 20% commission. You could even beat your own <0.10% transaction fee! 

2. 🎰 Lottery - A blockchain-based lottery with potential earnings of 0-30% commission. 

3. 🪙 Wallet - A multicurrency crypto wallet that supports Bitcoin, Ethereum, and tokens. 

4. 🌾 Farming - Attract investment by offering rewards with ERC20 Staking & Yield Farming. 

5. 🗳 DAO - Governance and proposals for your HOTX token. 

6. 🌉 CrossChain - Create an EVM compatible blockchain bridge. 

7. 🚀 IDOFactory - Launchpad solution for IDO pools and token locking. 

We understand that with 350+ cryptocurrencies listed on HOTX, having these tools at your disposal could be a game-changer. 

Remember, it's all B2B, so you're not playing, you're creating. Let's chat if you're interested! Check out our demos at https://t.me/onoutdemos 🎈

PS: We'd love to get our hands on that 1000 USDT welcome gift package! 😉
